title: @Maraudaur - AVCON 2016 day 1# part 1#

embed.description: I'm not good at vlogging, but here is a small introduction into me. This is part of the trip I took to AVCON 2016. Facebook Page to the epic art stand. https://www.facebook.com/carnivalillustration/ Music belongs too: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC56Qctnsu8wAyvzf4Yx6LIw *I CANT TAG EVERYTHING YOUTUBE WONT LET ME* ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- I'm not good I'm sorry :( I'm a free coach for bronze players in League Of Legends!

body:
I dont like posting no league things here.
But I was asked too, so here is what AVCON looks like if you have never been.

Its mainly just music with some talking.
And the reason why I kept the clips of me walking is because I wanted to show what conventions are like.
Pact, full of people.
And ALOT of art stands there was like 20-30 different art stands (thats not including the merc stands.)

day 1 part 2 will have more examples of art/merc stands and even more cosplays.

replies.body:
Nice!

hope it was fun. It would have been great to see more cosplayers posing etc but I guess thats in the next part.

Part 2 will have more cosplays and art stands.
Day 2- will have the cosplay competition which was awesome.
